item.Q:

classics; sacred book; scripture; to pass through; to undergo; longitude; surname
item.A:
traditional: 經
jīng
经济 (經濟) jīngjì economy; economic

item.Q:
Write the character:
name; noun (part of speech); place (e.g. among winners); famous; classifier for people
item.A:
míng
著名 zhùmíng famous; noted; well-known; celebrated

shí
布尔什维克 (布爾什維克) bùěrshíwéikè bolshevik

traditional: 謝
xiè
感谢 (感謝) gǎnxiè (express) thanks; gratitude; grateful; thankful; thanks

item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sun; date; day of the month; abbr. for Japan
item.A:
rì
日本 Rìběn Japan; Japanese

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: just (right); main; upright; straight; correct; principle
2: Chinese 1st month of year
item.A:
1: zhèng 2: zhēng
正确 (正確) zhèngquè correct; proper 正月 zhēngyuè first month of the lunar new year

item.Q:
Write the character:
open; operate (vehicle); start; abbr. for 開爾文|开尔文 degrees Kelvin
item.A:
traditional: 開
kāi
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character:
dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said
item.A:
traditional: 話
huà
的话 (的話) dehuà if

item.Q:
Write the character:

2: take part in
item.A:
traditional: 與
1: yǔ 2: yù
与其 (與其) yǔqí it's better ... than ... 参与 (參與) cānyù to participate (in sth)

item.Q:

open; operate (vehicle); start; abbr. for 開爾文|开尔文 degrees Kelvin

item.Q:
Write the character: huà

item.A:

dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said
的话 (的話) dehuà if

item.Q:
Write the character: yǔ
(yǔqí de yǔ)
item.A:
traditional: 與
and; to give; together with
与其 (與其) yǔqí it's better ... than ...

item.Q:
Write the character: yù
(cānyù de yù)
item.A:
traditional: 與
take part in
参与 (參與) cānyù to participate (in sth)

traditional: 經理
jīnglǐ manager; director

traditional: 經過
jīngguò to pass; to go through; process; course
chūmíng well-known (for)
míngrén personage; celebrity
míngjīa the School of Logicians from the pre-Han period
dìmíng place name

Dàmíng Daming county in Hebei; Daimyo (Japanese feudal lord)
dàmíng Daming
tímíng nominate
yǒumíng famous; well-known

traditional: 無名
wúmíng nameless; obscure
zhīmíng well known; famous

traditional: 題名
tímíng autograph; to sign one's name

traditional: 點名
diǎnmíng roll call

traditional: 什麼
shénmó variant of 甚麽|什么, what; anything

traditional: 沒什麼
méishénme (idiom) nothing; (idiom) never mind; it's nothing

traditional: 為什麼
wèishénme why; for what reason
wèishěnme why

traditional: 多謝
duōxiè many thanks; thanks a lot

traditional: 謝意
xièyì gratitude; thanks

traditional: 謝謝
xièxie to thank
xièxiè to thank

traditional: 道謝
dàoxiè to express thanks
bùrì within the next few days; in a few days time
qiánrì day before yesterday
hǎorìzǐ good day

Dìngrì Tingri town in central Tibet
dìngrì Dingri
gōngzuòrì working day
RìZhōng Japan-China
rìchū sunrise
rìqián the other day; a few days ago
rìzi day; a (calendar) date; days of one's life
rìgōng peon

traditional: 日後
rìhòu sometime; someday (in the future)

Rìběn Japan; Japanese
rìběn Japan

Rìběnrén Japanese person or people
rìběnrén Japanese
rìyòng daily expenses; of everyday use

traditional: 時日
shírì time
shēngrì birthday

traditional: 當日
dāngrì that day

traditional: 過日子
guòrìzǐ to pass days

traditional: 一本正經
yīběnzhèngjīng in deadly earnest; deadpan

Fāngzhèng (N) Fangzheng (place in Heilongjiang); upright; four-square
fāngzhèng Fangzheng
zhèngjiāo orthogonality
zhèngzài in the process of (doing something or happening); while (doing)
zhènghǎo just (in time); just right; just enough; to happen to; to chance to; by chance; it just so happens that
zhèngrú be just like

Zhèngdìng (N) Zhengding (place in Hebei)
zhèngdìng Zhengding

zhèngwén actual text
zhēngwén main text (as opposed to footnotes); main body (of a book)
zhèngfǎ to be executed

traditional: 正當
zhèngdāng honest; reasonable; fair; sensible; timely; just (when needed)

traditional: 正經
zhèngjing earnestness
zhèngjīng decent; honorable; proper; serious; according to standards

traditional: 正電子
zhèngdiànzǐ antielectron
zhēngdiànzi positron (antiparticle of the electron)
zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

traditional: 對開
duìkāi of trains, buses or ships run from opposite direc

traditional: 開國
kāiguó to found a state; to open a closed country

traditional: 開學
kāixué foundation of a University or College; school opening; the start of a new term

traditional: 開工
kāigōng to begin work (of a factory or engineering operation); to start a construction job

traditional: 開心
kāixīn to feel happy; to rejoice; to have a great time; to make fun of sb

traditional: 開方
kāifāng to extract a square root

traditional: 開會
kāihuì have a meeting; be at a meeting; to hold or attend a meeting

traditional: 開發
kāifā exploit (a resource); open up (for development); to develop

traditional: 對話
duìhuà dialog

traditional: 會話
huìhuà conversation

traditional: 的話
dehuà if

traditional: 話本
huàběn Song and Yuan literary form based on vernacular folk stories

traditional: 話說
huàshuō it is said

traditional: 話題
huàtí subject (of a talk or conversation); topic

traditional: 說話
shuōhuà to speak; to say; to talk; to gossip; to tell stories; talk; word

traditional: 電話
diànhuà telephone; phone call

traditional: 與其
yǔqí it's better ... than ...

traditional: 與會
yùhuì (v) participate in a meeting

traditional: 與此同時
yǔcǐtóngshí at the same time; meanwhile
